lead_paragraph: Twenty-First Century Fox said it would offer some of its employees voluntary exit options with "generous" benefit packages, with the aim of reducing costs.

headline.main: Fox to Offer Some Employees Buyouts to Save Costs
headline.print_headline: Fox to Offer Some Employees Buyouts to Save Costs

snippet: Twenty-First Century Fox said it would offer some of its employees voluntary exit options with "generous" benefit packages, with the aim of reducing costs.
